text: Timi usako pasama ja'u ra bhanah â€˜ki hami timro palanakartaka sandesta haum. Timi hamro sathama isra'ilaka santanala'i patha'ide'u ra uniharula'i yatana nade'u. Hami timro pasama timro palanaharaka nisaniharu li'era a'eka chaum. Ra jasale sahi margadarsanako kura mandacha tyasaila'i salamati (prasanti) prapta hunecha
